icon.name: Rad-contamination
icon.info: You’ve received radiation contamination by the amount of [X] rad/sec

icon.name: Pesca Proibida
icon.info: Você não pode pescar nessa área.

icon.name: Campfire
icon.info: You are near the campfire.

icon.name: *Viagem
icon.info: Você está liberado para viajar.

icon.name: *Obstacle
icon.info: You are too close to another fisher.

icon.name: *Realistic
icon.info: First-person view is on.

icon.name: Settlement
icon.info: You are in the settlement borders.

icon.name: Sem Equipamento
icon.info: A vara não está montada!

icon.name: Dentro d'água
icon.info: Você está na água, cuidado!

icon.name: *ATENÇÃO! Sua mochila está cheia!
icon.info: You have items you can lose in case of moving! Check you inventory.

icon.name: *ATENÇÃO! Cesto de Peixe!
icon.info: O cesto está cheio ou ausente, você não tem onde guardar o peixe.

icon.name: Light rigging
icon.info: Too light bait for this tackle. The range of casting is lowered by [X]%, the accuracy of casting is lowered by [Y]%

icon.name: Heavy rigging
icon.info: Too heavy bait for this tackle. The deterioration of a rod is increased by [X]%, the range of casting is increased by [Y]%

icon.name: *Subiu de Nível
icon.info: Você subiu de nível. Bonus de experiência: [X]

icon.name: *Novo e-mail
icon.info: Você tem [X] e-mails não lidos.

icon.name: RAD-protector [X] r/s на [Y]%
icon.info: Lowers the penetrating radiation impact below [X] r/s on [Y]%

icon.name: RAD-blocker [X]%
icon.info: Lowers the negative radiation effect on [X]%, by ingesting food, drink or medicine

icon.name: Poisoning [X]
icon.info: Your organism is poisoned by [X] life points per second.

icon.name: *Regeneration [X]
icon.info: + [X] life points per second

icon.name: Você é VIP
icon.info:
Esses são os bônus:
* Áreas dos Mapas mais nítido * Custo da venda de peixe +25% * Timeout para nova missão -50% * Experiência adquirida com peixes +50% * Experiência adquirida para completar missão +25%

icon.name: *Learning +[X]%
icon.info: +[X]% experience for fish you caught

icon.name: Skill learning
icon.info: The skill learning is in progress. You’ve learned [Y]% 10% of all experience you get go to the skill learning

icon.name: Satiety
icon.info: You aren’t hungry, food effects are lowered by [X]% and additional effects are not applied

icon.name: Intoxication
icon.info: You’ve recently ingested medicine, effects are lowered by [X]% and additional effects are not applied

icon.name: No thirst
icon.info: You’re not thirsty, effects are lowered by [X]% and additional effects are not applied

icon.name: *Resistance
icon.info: Increases radiation resistance by [X], agressive environment resistance by [Y].\n Sums up with suit properties

icon.name: *Skills learning
icon.info: Increases skills gained experience by [X]%

icon.name: *Endurance regeneration
icon.info: + [X] endurance per second

icon.name: *Sitting
icon.info: + [X] stamina per second,/n-[Y]% fisher power

icon.name: *Fatigue
icon.info: Your character is tired. He/she isn’t able to run anymore, has no wish to fish and your fishing strength is reduced. /nTake a rest or use an energy drink
